thread.title: Canada Announces New Antidumping Measures

author: Kim Mackrael
title: Canada Announces New Antidumping Measures
text:
OTTAWA—Canada’s government said it would bring in new rules to prevent diversion and transshipping of steel and aluminum.
The announcement comes several days after the U.S. introduced global tariffs on steel and aluminum imports, aimed at protecting domestic steelmakers from cheaper offshore imports. Canada was among several countries to receive temporary exemptions to the tariffs until May 1.
